articles.title: AFL trade period as it happened: Clark to Fremantle and ruckmen switch clubs at rapid rate - The Age
articles.description: Jordan Dawson became an Adelaide player late on Thursday. Several ruckmen have switched clubs today. Follow our live blog on the final day of the AFL trade period.day.
